# unitoot.jl Documentation

<a id='LowFrequencyEconometrics.lfst_test' href='#LowFrequencyEconometrics.lfst_test'>#</a>
**`LowFrequencyEconometrics.lfst_test`** &mdash; *Function*.



$$
LFST = \frac{\sum^q_{j=1} X^2_{j,T}}{\sum^q_{j=1}}
$$
